pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Vector Heterogeneous Autoregressive Modeling // Tools to model and forecast multivariate time series including Bayesian Vector heterogeneous autoregressive (VHAR) model by Kim Baek (2023) (doi:10.1080/00949655.2023.2281644). 'bvhar' can model Vector Autoregressive (VAR), VHAR, Bayesian VAR (BVAR), and Bayesian VHAR (BVHAR) models.
